channel.title: Topic Modeling on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in Topic Modeling on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: FASTopic: Pretrained Transformer is a Fast, Adaptive, Stable, and Transferable Topic Model
item.description: FASTopic: a pretrained transformer-based topic model achieving superior speed, adaptivity, stability, and transferability compared to existing methods.
